personal.name: Ronaldo Garcia Sevilla
personal.title: Data Scientist | AI Engineer | Analytics Developer
personal.bio: Data Scientist and AI practitioner passionate about building analytics solutions, automating workflows, and transforming complex data into actionable insights. Experienced in Python, cloud computing, machine learning, and enterprise operations.

about.description: I am a Data Science & AI graduate student specializing in machine learning, automation, analytics engineering, and cloud technologies. My work spans enterprise sourcing analytics, workflow automation, ERP data operations, and academic tutoring. I focus on building practical, scalable, and efficient solutions that support decision-making across business and technical environments.
highlights: Global Sourcing Analyst at Costa Farms
Experience with ERP systems (Sage X3, SAMII) and automation (Power Automate, SharePoint)
Strong background in Python, SQL, AWS, machine learning, and data visualization
Dean's List every semester; Changemaker of the Year & CAA Bronze Award

projects.title: Savings Tracking & Automation Toolkit
projects.description: A suite of Python and Excel-based tools developed for Costa Farms sourcing managers to calculate realized vs. expected savings, automate manual workflows, and streamline cost-optimization analysis. Includes converter tools, pivot automation, validation modules, and UI dashboards.

projects.title: QR-Code Spec Sheet Automation System
projects.description: Developed a workflow enabling teams to transition from manual product lookup to a QR-based system for sourcing and receiving. Automates ingestion of product attributes, generates labeled PDFs, and links QR codes for vendor and internal use.

projects.title: AWS Cloud Architecture Capstone
projects.description: Designed and deployed a cloud architecture solution as part of a team project, implementing AWS services for a scalable system and documenting all components for final presentation.

experience.description: Supporting enterprise sourcing operations by building analytics tools and maintaining data accuracy across ERP systems.
achievements: Developed Excel-based and Python automation tools to support cost optimization and savings analysis
Managed sourcing data and workflows across Sage X3 and vendor/product systems

experience.description: Provided operational and analytical support for travel procedures and cost reconciliation.
achievements: Built Excel VBA tools to identify subset-sum matches for travel cost reconciliation
Prepared cost-trend reports and supported travel policy updates

experience.description: Tutored students in foundational and advanced analytics and programming topics.
achievements: Provided tutoring for Python, SQL, R, analytics, and cloud fundamentals
Designed and led Python workshops improving student proficiency

experience.description: Built internal automation solutions using ERP data and visualization tools.
achievements: Automated product information search across shipments using QR-based workflows
Used SAMII/Sage ERP data to streamline conversions and calculations

experience.description: Led civic engagement initiatives, academic projects, and new student outreach.
achievements: Delivered weekly presentations on democratic engagement and student resources
Created data collection processes for peer mentor impact analysis

education.degree: Master of Science in Data Science & Artificial Intelligence
Bachelor of Science in Data Analytics
education.description: Highest Honors (3.96 GPA). Recipient of EmTech REP Grant, Padron Medal Scholarship, CAA Bronze Award, Changemaker of the Year, and eMerge Americas Rising Star.

education.degree: Associate of Science in Business Intelligence
